name: Squing
overview: An action game created by Mania-Soft and released in 1986. A 3-D version of Pong seen from the perspective of the pong players. You control a black paddle on the far wall. When the ball comes, to keep the game going you must put your black paddle right where the ball is going, which will deflect it and keep this wall ball game going. You get a point every time you successfully return the ball. See who can get the high score!
